mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.spu_id, t1.sale_attr_name, t1.base_sale_attr_id, t2.id AS spu_sale_attr_value_id, t2.sale_attr_value_name FROM spu_sale_attr t1 INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value t2 ON t1.spu_id = t2.spu_id AND t1.base_sale_attr_id = t2.base_sale_attr_id WHERE t1.spu_id = #{spuId};

SELECT t1.id, t1.spu_id, t1.sale_attr_name, t1.base_sale_attr_id, t2.id AS spu_sale_attr_value_id, t2.sale_attr_value_name, if(t3.sku_id is null, 0, 1) as is_checked FROM spu_sale_attr t1 INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value t2 ON t1.spu_id = t2.spu_id AND t1.base_sale_attr_id = t2.base_sale_attr_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value t3 ON t3.sale_attr_value_id = t2.id and t3.sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE t1.spu_id = #{spuId} ORDER BY t2.id;
